content.title: Front-end Developer
content.description: Hi, I have been working with web development for 9 years, I'm graduated in Information Systems at Unisul and also in technical programming at SENAI college. I have participated in open source projects on Github and I'm a great Javascript enthusiast, In Brazil I used to be an organizer of the FloripaJS community and also Front-in-Floripa one of the biggest front-end events in Santa Catarina. At the moment I'm working at MediaMonks, one of the most responsible for the media in Netherlands.
